main.name: Nishant Bhujbal
main.bio: I'm a senior at IIIT-K pursuing my BTech in Computer Science Engineering with a passion for programming. Currently a Full-Stack web and app developer. Eager to meet new people and acquire new skills.

experience.name: Maximl
experience.Desc: Created a No-Code Platform enabling drag-and-drop elements like buttons, tables. Integrated REST API queries for dynamic data display.Continuously optimized and enhanced user experience through iterative development.Developed a web-based annotation tool using React to enable seamless annotation of PID diagrams. Key features included PDF rendering, annotation tools, zoom and pan functionalities, and comprehensive annotation management capabilities.

projects.title: Z-Chat
projects.dis: Built a Flutter and Firebase chat app featuring real-time messaging, user auth, multimedia sharing, push notifications, and offline support. Enhanced communication with sleek design and strong backend

projects.title: Apple Webiste
projects.dis: Built an Apple website clone using React.js and Tailwind CSS for efficient development and responsiveness. Enhanced UI with Three.js, GSAP, and a sleek design to mimic the original Apple site.

projects.title: Recipe-Finder
projects.dis: Created React-based website for instant recipe suggestions based on user-inputted ingredients.lntegrated reliable Food API for accurate and dynamic recipe data.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.dis: Developed interactive TicTacToe game using Flutter with support for up to three simultaneous players.Utilized advanced features and tools provided by Flutter framework.
